original_title: Wibi Soerjadi - Pieces of a Dream
overview: A passionate talk between conductor Roland Kieft and master pianist Wibi Soerjadi in which they talk about parts of the SACD. You'll also get to take a look inside and outside the property Wulpherhorst, the home of Wibi Soerjadi.
title: Wibi Soerjadi - Pieces of a Dream
